“(nabiye) awasana kalaya gana (eya kawada ennedayi) minisun obagen wimasannaha.(eyata) oba mese pawasanu,(eya kawada enneda yana) ehi kalaya danne allah pamanaya.oba dannehuda?eya ithamath samipayehima paminimata ida atha.” (alkuraan 33 : 63-65) winishcha dinaya yana mema wachanaya alkuraanaye thawath noyekuth nami walin sandahan we. 1.alyawimiddin – prathipala nikuth karana dinaya 2.yawimul kiyama – sita ganiemi dinaya 3.yawimul hisabi – wibhaga karana dinaya 4.yawumul bahs – nawatha nagitawana dinaya 5.yawimul hashr – ekata ek raswana dinaya awasan dinaya kawada siduweyida?
